column1:
function getQuerystring(key, default_) {
		if (default_==null) default_=""""; 
		key = key.replace(/[\[]/,""\\\["").replace(/[\]]/,""\\\]"");
		var regex = new RegExp(""[\\?&]""+key+""=([^&#]*)"");
		var qs = regex.exec(window.location.href);
		if(qs == null)
			return default_;
		else
			return qs[1];
	}
